channel.title: Comments on: 211.8: Bad day on the bike

item.title: By: Daddyo
item.dc:creator: Daddyo
item.description:
Try a banana. Seriously. You sound like you need some potassium--which helps keep your muscles operating at peak efficiency. Best way to get it--a banana.
A for effort--keep up the good work and you'll feel fitter in about a month or so.
Daddyo
item.content:encoded:
Try a banana. Seriously. You sound like you need some potassium–which helps keep your muscles operating at peak efficiency. Best way to get it–a banana.

A for effort–keep up the good work and you’ll feel fitter in about a month or so.
